paragraph.title: About Us
paragraph.paragraph: Our company, LLC “Firdavs Mebel,” has been successfully operating in the furniture market since 2008. Over these years, we have accumulated invaluable practical experience. Every technological and production process has been refined to the smallest detail, and every movement has been perfected. We offer FURNITURE under the brand “СНINAR,” made from synthetic rattan with a wide range of products, and the collection is constantly being updated.

furnituresSection.heading: Since 2008, we have crafted over 100,000 pieces of furniture

components.title: Woven furniture is often used in gardens, on terraces, and balconies
Woven sofas and armchairs can add lightness and elegance to a living room
Furniture for kitchens and dining rooms
Woven furniture can add a touch of romance and naturalness to the bedroom.
Furniture sets for restaurants and cafes
A woven rocking chair can be the perfect spot to relax in any corner of the home or garden.

collection.heading: New summer collection from Chinar for your home and establishment

qualitySection.heading: We carefully control the production quality, ensuring the durability of our furniture for over 10 years.

deliverySection.heading: WORLDWIDE DELIVERY, PAYMENT AFTER INSPECTION AT YOUR HOME

elements.title: Delivery Conditions
elements.mainText: Delivery within Tashkent starts from 30,000 UZS. We also ship furniture to other cities in Uzbekistan, with delivery terms discussed individually. Delivery to the client is carried out by our staff, who will also assist with lifting and assembling the furniture.

elements.title: Payment Methods
elements.mainText: Any form of payment is accepted—cashless, cash, or bank transfer. You can pay 100% of the total cost upfront or deposit 10% of the total amount, with the remaining balance paid after inspection and delivery of the furniture to your home.

questions.question: What are the delivery conditions?
questions.answer: Delivery within Tashkent starts from 30,000 UZS. We also ship furniture to other cities in Uzbekistan, with delivery terms discussed individually. Delivery to the client is carried out by our staff, who will also assist with lifting and assembling the furniture.

questions.question: What payment methods are available?
questions.answer: Any form of payment is accepted—cashless, cash, or bank transfer. You can pay 100% of the total cost upfront or deposit 10% of the total amount, with the remaining balance paid after inspection and delivery of the furniture to your home.

questions.question: How many days will it take to be ready after ordering?
How long is the warranty period?
questions.answer: Our products have a warranty of 10 years.

questions.question: Can you customize according to the interior?
questions.answer: Yes, please leave a request on the website or contact us.
